===Adverb===
{{zh-adverb}}

# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[eventually]]; [[one day]]
#: {{zh-x|佢 終須 會 去 多倫多。|One day, he will go to Toronto.|C}}

=====Usage notes=====
{{zh-l|終須}} is for talking about an undetermined time in the future, but {{zh-l|終於}} is for talking about an determined time in the past or in the present.

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|終究}}
* {{zh-l|始終}}
* {{zh-l|終歸}}
* {{zh-l|早晚}}
* {{zh-l|遲早}}
